title: New Project Offers Job Training for Ukrainian IDPs (IREX - International Research & Exchanges Board) ...
text: ( Source : IREX - International Research & Exchanges Board ) IREX is pleased to announce the Libraries and Employability in Conflict-Affected Areas of Ukraine project. The project will help internally displaced persons (IDPs) to provide
